description.narrative: Enhancing the prosperity and resilience of upland smallholder farmers and strengthening the resilience of upland communities, especially youth, and improve their integration into markets.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

description.narrative:
Outcome 1: Strengthened economic development clusters Indicators: Percentage of households reporting an increase in production (Core Indicator 1.2.4) Percentage of households having established market linkages within EDC Output Indicators: 1.1 Number of MSPs established and functional (Core Indicator policy 2) 1.2 Value of infrastructure constructed/ rehabilitated (million EUR) 1.3 Number of persons trained in production practices and/or technologies (Core Indicator 1.1.4) 1.4 Number of hectares of land brought under climate-resilient management (Core Indicator 3.1.4) 1.5 Number of products branded based on geographical origin
Outcome 2: Increased utilization of financial services among rural people in uplands Indicators: Percentage decline in collateral coverage requested by participating financial institutions Output Indicators: 2.1 Number of loans provided using the credit guarantee scheme (value of loans to be analyzed under the M&E system) (10% youth, 30% women) 2.2 Number of persons in rural areas trained in financial literacy and/or use of financial products and services (Core Indicator 1.1.7) (10% youth, 30% women) 2.3 Percentage of persons in rural areas accessing financial services (Core Indicator 1.1.5, 10% youth, 30% women)

comment.narrative:
Outcome 1: Strengthened economic development clusters Outputs: 1.1 EDC MSPs established 1.2 Supported EDCs infrastructure 1.3 Farmers/ organizations capacitated 1.4 Farmers/organization investments 1.5 Branding and promotion of upland produce
Outcome 2: Increased utilization of financial services among rural people in uplands Outputs: 2.1 Developing a new credit mechanism system KGF/PGS 2.2 New partnerships established with financial sector actors (mainly private banks)

Outcome 1: Strengthened economic development clusters Indicators: Percentage of households reporting an increase in production (Core Indicator 1.2.4) Percentage of households having established market linkages within EDC Output Indicators: 1.1 Number of MSPs established and functional (Core Indicator policy 2) 1.2 Value of infrastructure constructed/ rehabilitated (million EUR) 1.3 Number of persons trained in production practices and/or technologies (Core Indicator 1.1.4) 1.4 Number of hectares of land brought under climate-resilient management (Core Indicator 3.1.4) 1.5 Number of products branded based on geographical origin

Outcome 1: Strengthened economic development clusters Indicators: Percentage of households reporting an increase in production (Core Indicator 1.2.4): 0 Percentage of households having established market linkages within EDC: 0 Output Indicators: 1.1 Number of MSPs established and functional (Core Indicator policy 2): 18 1.2 Value of infrastructure constructed/ rehabilitated (million EUR): 0 1.3 Number of persons trained in production practices and/or technologies (Core Indicator 1.1.4): 1150 1.4 Number of hectares of land brought under climate-resilient management (Core Indicator 3.1.4): 0 1.5 Number of products branded based on geographical origin: 0
Outcome 2: Increased utilization of financial services among rural people in uplands Indicators: Percentage decline in collateral coverage requested by participating financial institutions: 0 Output Indicators: 2.1 Number of loans provided using the credit guarantee scheme (value of loans to be analyzed under the M&E system) (10% youth, 30% women): 0 2.2 Number of persons in rural areas trained in financial literacy and/or use of financial products and services (Core Indicator 1.1.7) (10% youth, 30% women): 480 2.3 Percentage of persons in rural areas accessing financial services (Core Indicator 1.1.5, 10% youth, 30% women): TBD

The project has officially started on 17 July 2020 according to Project Document and the implementation of the Project activities have been realized starting from September 2020. Due to these factors and limited time period, the results planned for 2020 year will be achieved on 2021 year and reflected to the system accordingly.

The project has officially started on 17 July 2020 according to Project Document and the implementation of the Project activities have been realized starting from September 2020. Due to these factors, no results have been achieved for 2019 year.
